articles.content: JACKSONVILLE, Fla. A winter storm leaving behind icy roads, power outages and dangerously low temperatures from the Southwest to the Canadian border has delayed shipments of coronavirus vaccines to F… [+5099 chars]

articles.author: Scott Mayerowitz
articles.title: Remembering Marriott’s Arne Sorenson, the man behind the world’s largest hotel chain - The Points Guy
articles.description: At TPG, we focus on points, miles and making your next vacation better. We don’t normally write obituaries. But today, I wanted to look back at Arne M. Sorenson, the president and CEO of Marriott International who died on Monday, Feb. 15, after losing his fig…
